review_text: good place for bounding with family. Amazing pool where you can swimming with the fish.

If you want something different  or out from beach this place is good for you, though you should be more careful especially to those stairs cause they are a little bit slippery but still, we do have a great day in this place.
As always nice place to relax during summer :) Newly Renovated! Highly Recommended:)
chilly spring water with cute fishes. We went on a monday morning. you have to pay environmental fee of 100php, floaters are 500php. parking fee for motorbikes are 20php.

If you need a cool dip to freshen up from a hot summer day then this is one of your best place to visit.  The place is very relaxing and the spring water is ice cold.  You will definitely get a cool down if you take a dip.  Nice place for a small gathering of friends and family.
Diff. worth coming back. Really really nice and cold spring water, good for relaxing, unwinding and also they have friendly kind staffs. Good job!

Wewere the only customers during our visit. Walk in is okay. No booking needed. Very spacious and cleab. Grill bar is nearby. Very cold spring. Cottages  rate at 350php. entrabce is 50 php.

You can enjoy the place and especially the cold clear water.
Nice small little place... cheap cottage as well.. water moves with the tide so low tide has low water level but still enjoyable..

When I visited there, there were only a few people. The place is spacious and you can bring your lunch and drink beer in a cottage. I found it a pretty cool place to spend time with friends.
Nice place to plunge during hot summer days. The area is clean and there are benches where you can leave your belongings if you decided to just drop by.

a cool place to have a swim and chillax for a short while. just prepare 40 pesos for entrance fee... it has 3 pools but only 1 is allowed to swim and dip into. the other 2 pools have fishes... it has cottages worth 250-500 and private rooms worth 1400 pesos. but, it doesn't have much if you wanna stay longer...

I love the place, especially if no one uses the Karaoke and it is quiet. I know people loving Karaoke but when a drunken girl sings completely out of tune it sounds like a dog trying to meow like a cat.

The place is great. If there isn't many people the water is blue, it turns green if it's too crowded. And there isn't any life vest available to use if you don't know how to swim since it's pretty deep.

What a surprise to find this refreshing place 3 minutes away from where I stayed when visiting my son and his wife . Great place to chill ,picnic , spend time with friends and family....share a drink or two....fantastic.

A natural spring used to be used by locals to wash their clothes and bathe their karabao. However, now it became a private owned natural pool. An ideal place for cooling down during such hot and humid weather. ‚Ä¶
